attributes.action: Petition parliament to ask the Queen to appoint a new Prime minister
attributes.additional_details: The electorate won the mandate on leaving the EU. The conservative government of the day issued every household with a document outlining exactly what that meant. This must be upheld and delivered for the sake of our democracy or democracy ceases to be excepted by our own government who are paid to represent the said electorate.
attributes.background: Theresa May is diluting, ignoring the will of the electorate over leaving the EU.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for  Ministers to be removed from their post.

 If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
